description: view of a colonate with arches; sculpture of embracing figures in LLC; sculpture with three figures and Christ child above nearest column; second colonade on top of lower level
inscription: verso printed in black: L\'architecture du grand édifice se developpe dans un mélange de styles divers, parmi lesquels domine l\'arabe. | verso LLC in pencil: IT-433 1500-
markings: bottom center impressed in paper: PONTI / RIVADEISCHIAVON / VENEZIA
medium: Albumen print from a collodion negative
signed: verso printed in black: Palais Ducal, vu du Baptistére.
title: Palais Ducal, vu du Baptistère, Venice
